Content.Text: Good morning, <MYNAME>. I'm coming in, OK?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, <MYNAME>, how's your farm doing? I
came here today to tell you about a new
<RED>festival</RED> that I decided to throw.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
And that festival is... the <RED>Fishing
Festival</RED>!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
The festival is held over 3 days, and
participants compete to see who can
catch the most fish. 
<PAGE>
Everyone in town plans to compete, so
I hope you can join in too!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
The <RED>opening ceremony</RED> will be on <BLUE>Fall 15</BLUE>
and the <RED>results</RED> on <BLUE>Fall 18</BLUE>, both from
<BLUE>12:00 PM</BLUE> at the <GREEN>festival grounds</GREEN>.
<PAGE>
On the start day, be sure to come talk
to me at the festival entrance before
<BLUE>3:00 PM</BLUE>, OK?
<PAGE>
Keep in mind that <RED>you won't be able to
compete If you don't attend the opening
ceremony</RED>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Fishing Festival's <RED>opening ceremony</RED>
is on <BLUE>Fall 15</BLUE> and the <RED>results</RED> on <BLUE>Fall 
18</BLUE>, at <BLUE>12:00 PM</BLUE> at the <GREEN>festival grounds</GREEN>.
<PAGE>
As today just happens to be Fall 15, the
festival will take place this afternoon.
Sorry for the short notice!
<PAGE>
Again, It starts from <BLUE>12:00 PM</BLUE> at the
<GREEN>festival grounds</GREEN>, so come talk to me
at the festival entrance before <BLUE>3:00 PM</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
Keep in mind that <RED>you won't be able to
compete If you don't attend the opening
ceremony</RED>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can confirm the festival's details
on the <BLUE>calendar</BLUE>, so look it over if you
need to.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well then, I must be on my way. Sorry to
barge in so early in the morning. Give
it your best today!
